title: PADPIE-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Integrated STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics knowledge and experience in educational planning
context.additional_context: Field-oriented program to strengthen integrated STEM education design competencies for corporate managers/leaders. Cultivating the ability to design practical lessons through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design integrated STEM educational activities by applying the six stages of the PADPIE model: Preparation, Analysis, Design, Planning, Implementation, and Evaluation.
Learners can develop math-centered interdisciplinary tasks and create educational content applicable to real corporate settings.
The efficiency of education activities designed through peer assessment can be analyzed, and improvement measures can be derived.

resources: Mobile Learning Materials for Low-Tech Environments
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
